string.text: {}{LEADER}'s {SUFFIX}
{=QuIDvx2sTf}Army does not have enough member parties.
{=zMGaTGyR}Manage this army
{=DOm6wr2eaH}You cannot manage contracts as a mercenary
{=mGWrSJLE}You cannot manage an army while it's in a map event.
{=lUyxAp4fS5}You cannot manage an army unless you are the faction leader or an army member.
{=2CbfALwAds}Sign Contract
{=NhIpemI2}Extend Contract
{=21wfq1qG5i}Terminate contract
{=MQmvOm8vtT}No Mercenary Selected
{=uEXvgrsQ}Add +{BOOSTAMOUNT} cohesion to this army
{=uhxCnG4n}Change Army Leader
{=TOC7RWdV}Are you sure you want to change this armies leader? It will cost you {COST} influence.
{=wPSl2v80}{newline}{newline}WARNING: You will not be added to the new army.
{=8MvD4u4J}Split Army
{=tyZxyL8d}Are you sure you want to split this army? It will cost you between {MIN_COST} and {MAX_COST} influence.
{=n7wMx7op}{newline}{newline}WARNING: Your army will lose the selected leader if they're a member and any member parties you select. You will remain the leader of the old army.
{=kqeA8rjL}Are you sure you want to disband your army?
{=619gtcXb}Are you sure you want to disband this army? This will result in relation loss.
{=FdzsOvDq}This action is disabled while in a mission.
{=DvO4aGre}You can not perform this action while the army is in a siege.
{=aXPDpkAR} You can not perform this action while the army is in a map event.
